title: Bleep Fitness Test
features: Configurable audio cues indicating the start of each shuttle and level
description: Perform the mutli-stage Bleep Fitness Test to determine your true level of fitness. It is designed to push your stamina and endurance to the limit.The test is often regarded as one of the key entry requirements for most police and military service entry across the globe is available on your Android phone. The Bleep Fitness Test is a handy component for anyone serious about their fitness regime.Free Key Features:* Single user profile* Configurable audio cues indicating the start of each shuttle and level* Calculates users VO2Max performance with rating* Tablular display of users results* Share your results via email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, etc.* Easy to read and use UI* Contains advertsAdditional Paid Features:* Multiple users profiles and results history* No advertsThis app uses text to speech (TTS) so requires an approiate text to speech app (see https://market.android.com/developer?pub=Android+TextToSpeech)Request new features, we get many requests from users and are always keen to hear feedback. Requested so far are:* Creates a colour coded rating for your performance* Include a GPS measuring tool to assist in setting out a 20m shuttle runThe Bleep Test is also known as Beep Test, Shuttle Run, Pacer Test or Multistage Fitness Test.
